author: Bijan Stephen
title: The show must go on: here’s how Twitch streamers are handling quarantine
description: Twitch is bigger than ever, according to the data, because of the novel coronavirus. Here’s how streamers like Trihex, GrandPooBear, and Nikatine are handling it.
content: Alex Castro Viewership is up, but so is the sense of having a responsibility to the people watching Twitch is bigger than it’s ever been before. The site’s viewership increased a full 31 percent between March 8th and March 22nd, growing to 43 million hours wa… [+11629 chars]
